SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT21GPA_UAKUNK
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Acknowledgement of a GPA Message Received by an LT (UAK/UNK)
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message confirms that the user has received a message from the system, and has accepted (UAK) or rejected (UNK) the message.
From: User To: GPA
Notes The Basic Header identifies the message which is being acknowledged. The sending LT in the Basic Header must correspond to the receiving LT which is identified in the Basic Header of the output message. The branch code must also correspond.

SystemField.Name: date-time
SystemField.description: Date and time, local to the user, of this message.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: date-time
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Date and time are always given as local, unless otherwise specified. Local time for the SWIFT Network is in GMT.

SystemField.Name: accept-reject
SystemField.description:
Accepted or rejected, where:
a) 0 = accepted
b) 1 = rejected

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: accept-reject
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Accepted or rejected, where:
a) 0 = accepted
b) 1 = rejected

SystemField.Name: rejection-reason
SystemField.description:
Reason for rejection. See the SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.
Also contains a line number (for user-to-user messages) or a field number (for system messages).

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: rejection-reason
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Reason for rejection. See the SWIFTNet FIN Error Codes module for the full set of error codes.
Also contains a line number (for user-to-user messages) or a field number (for system messages).
